author: @ankurcoco
text:
I am writing to express my frustration regarding the delay in the delivery of my Ola Roadster 2.5 kW variant, which I booked on September 24, 2025. I uploaded all the necessary documents and made the full payment on the same day. At that time, the estimated delivery date was October 7, 2025, but I have yet to receive my vehicle.

Despite my efforts to resolve this issue, I have been unsuccessful in obtaining any information. I have called customer support daily, sent several emails, and raised a ticket through the Ola app, but I have not received any response. When I do manage to reach customer care, I often find myself waiting for hours, only to be told that the concerns team will call me back. Unfortunately, I have never received a follow-up call.

This ongoing situation has caused me significant mental distress. I feel as though purchasing an Ola vehicle was a mistake due to the lack of support and resolution. It is incredibly frustrating to wait on the phone for hours, only to be left in the dark about my delivery.

I am particularly concerned about the repeated delays and have requested to cancel my order and receive a refund. However, my request has not been accommodated, leaving me without a vehicle and without a refund. I don't understand why there has been such a lengthy delay in the delivery of my bike, especially since it was supposedly dispatched approximately two months ago. This raises concerns about whether this is a scam, as my bike has not arrived at my nearest showroom. 

Given these issues, I worry that if the bike breaks down in the future, it will take a considerable amount of time to have it serviced, potentially leading to my entire warranty expiring.

At this point, I feel I have no option left but to file a case with the consumer forum.
Order ID- OET-947023220240925-GYA600

text:
BAN OLA IN UTTARAKHAND PLEASE...,üôèüò≠
Very bad service.. no one listens..not RSA service providing,, no any service working... 
Grievance Number: 8172748

Grievance Reg Date:¬†2025-11-15 15:04:34

Grievance Type :Complaint¬†¬†Grievance Details :To, The National Consumer Helpline, Subject: Complaint against Ola Electric for non-resolution of battery issue and denial of serviceRespected Sir/Madam,I am writing to formally complain about the negligent service and unresolved battery issue of my Ola electric scooter. For the past 15 days, my scooter‚Äôs battery charge has suddenly dropped from 60% down to 0%, causing the battery to enter a deep discharge state. Despite multiple complaints and requests to Ola, neither has my battery been replaced nor has their roadside assistance (RSA) come to pick up the scooter from my home.My scooter is under Ola‚Äôs Care Plus plan, but they are refusing to replace the battery, citing that deep discharge is not covered under warranty. Over these 15 days, I have repeatedly charged the battery fully and reported the issue. Ola experience centre/service centre Rudrapur, uttarakhand udham singh nagar pin 263153
Prakash pandey 
9045183216

author: @agrajvemuri3839
text: Dear friends  I'm writing to express extreme dissatisfaction and frustration with the service provided by Ola for my S1 scooter. Despite multiple attempts to raise a complaint through the app and calling customer care, I've been met with silence and inaction for the past 3 days.  The issues persist: - Liquid leaking from the front part of the scooter - Battery not charging - No response from customer support or RSA despite multiple calls and app complaints(since 4 days)  I've purchased Ola Care+ for a year, but the benefits are inaccessible due to lack of service. Spare parts are costly and unavailable. Given the poor service and unresolved issues. #DONT BUY OLA
